text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono is always making food<n>for me, so I want to
return the favor.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In pursuit of that goal, I head to the<n>shopping mall to scope
out my<n>options.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! Fancy meeting you here!<n>Are you doing some
shopping?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I was just taking a peek at all the<n>sweet and savory
options here. If I<n>notice anything new, I want to give it<n>a
try!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I had some raspberry<n>macarons! After I found a spot
in the<n>sitting area, I gobbled them right up. ☆

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
But not before I took a picture, of<n>course. I have to send
something<n>along with my review to my parents.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
You see, whenever I find a new tasty<n>treat, I send them a
pic and a review.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Both my parents work in the culinary<n>field, so they really
enjoy reading<n>about my finds.
choice_data_list:
Oh yeah, it was your parents who taught you to
cook, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Mm-hm, that's right! My dad is a<n>chef at an Italian
restaurant, and my<n>mom is a patissier.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
So even though I loooove cooking, I<n>also enjoy searching
for new dishes<n>to share with my parents!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She does seem to be enjoying<n>herself. Perhaps this is my
chance to<n>repay her with some good,<n>homemade food.
choice_data_list: Is there anything else you're craving right now?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh? Why do you ask?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: WHAT?! You don't need to pay meback for that! I get all therepayment I need watching you eatmy food!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
You always have such a big smile on<n>your face when you
eat my cooking.<n>That's more than enough.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
It's a little hard to explain, but... I can<n>feel this warm, fuzzy
feeling filling my<n>heart to the brim when I watch you<n>eat.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, seriously, you don't need to<n>worry about it. ☆
choice_data_list:
But always being on the receiving end is a little
awkward.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm... Then how about this? I want<n>to see you eat my
food again, so<n>come over for dinner, and I'll make<n>you
something!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Okay! ☆ Time to get shopping! If we<n>want ingredients, I think
the shopping<n>district is better than the mall.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I hope you're ready for a real<n>smorgasbord!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I was thinking of simmering some<n>chicken and vegetables
in water to<n>start, but other than that—

text_block_list.name: Child
text_block_list.text: Ah! Sumo wrestlers!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: What?! Where? Where?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Following the gleeful cries and<n>pointed fingers of the
children, we<n>both see a couple of sumo wrestlers<n>on their
way back from practice.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Oh wow, real-life sumo wrestlers!<n>Trainer, do you think I can
go talk to<n>them?
choice_data_list: As long as they don't mind.
As long as they don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Right, of course!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! Hello!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono beams with joy as<n>the sumo wrestlers turn
to meet her<n>calls.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They answer her various questions<n>with smiles on their
faces. I'm sure<n>Hishi Akebono's enthusiasm tickles<n>
them.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Really? So that's what you put in<n>your hot pot...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I see. A nutritious bowl of chankoreally is the key to strength.

text_block_list.name: Sumo Wrestler
text_block_list.text:
Haha, you know it! Without that hot<n>pot, we'd never get this
strong!

text_block_list.name: Sumo Wrestler
text_block_list.text: After all, it's food made withfeeling. No way you can eat thatand not get strong!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
I bet whoever's making the hot pot<n>really wants you to
enjoy your food! I<n>feel the same way when I cook for<n>
others.

text_block_list.name: Sumo Wrestler
text_block_list.text: Oh? It's not just the cook's feelings,<n>you know!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Sumo Wrestler
text_block_list.text:
You can't have a true chanko without<n>adding feelings from
the people eating<n>your food! Hahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: A true chanko... The feelings from the<n>people eating...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, I don't get it. How are you<n>supposed to add the
feelings of the<n>people eating to a hot pot?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: I mean, they're not going to eat it until<n>it's done, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: So how can you add their feelings in...<n>before...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I have a suspicion that the sumo<n>wrestler was referring to
the gratitude<n>both sides feel for each other.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps that's why most meals<n>begin with a thank-you
said before<n>digging in... The food just feels<n>incomplete
without it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: A true chanko... Do you have any<n>ideas, Trainer?
choice_data_list: Just a hunch. Let's test it out.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Huh? How?
choice_data_list: Next time, I'll be the one cooking.
Next time, I'll be the one cooking.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Hm, maybe that'll give me some kind<n>of hint...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Okay! Let's do it! I'm looking forward<n>to a good meal,
Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Starting from the day we met, Hishi<n>Akebono has served
me delicious<n>meal after delicious meal.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I finally have a chance to repay her<n>with a meal full of
gratitude!
